thread.title: Jenny De Yong
thread.title_full: Pimlico Plumbers reviewed by Jenny De Yong

author: Jenny De Yong
title: Jenny De Yong
text: Pimlico Plumbers came on a Saturday night when I was in a panic because of a flooded shower and kitchen. The plumber not only solved the problem but did it calmly and thoroughly. I have had emergency call-outs in the past and often felt whoever came was interested in making money rather than doing the work. In this case I felt the plumber knew his job and was keen to do it to the best of his ability.
